CustomField.formula:
/* Data Type Formula IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Meeting_Purpose__c, 'Core Client Team Meeting'), ISPICKVAL(Meeting_Purpose__c, 'Client Entertainment'), ISPICKVAL(Meeting_Purpose__c, 'Client Meeting'), ISPICKVAL(Meeting_Purpose__c, 'Client Road Show'), ISPICKVAL(Meeting_Purpose__c, 'Market Research Update') ), True, False) */
Related_Event_Report__r.Core_Meeting__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Interactions that develop the strategic relationship of the client. This applies to the following internal meeting, Core Client Team Meeting and the following external: Client Entertainment, Client Meeting, Client Roadshow, Market Research Update
CustomField.label: Core Meeting
